column3: Traffic;Kandal: A------ military official who was ------injured after an explosion------ from the gas tank of his car was rushed to  hospital yesterday in Takhmao
column4: where he died at about 2 am on April 13
column5: 2019.------The victim was named as a military officer from the Royal Gendarmerie
column6: Ngon Konthea------The incident occurred at 12:40 pm on April 12
